1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Chan Joo and Jin Se are seemingly happily married. After seeing an ex-flame on the job, Chan Joo can't seem to shake him from her mind. Jin Se begins renovation work on a dance studio and befriends one of the dancers. The dancer is happy to give him dance lessons.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Seo Chan Joo conducts an interview with Choi Eun Hyuk's wife. Baek In Kyung asks Seo Chan Joo to help her find Choi Eun Hyuk after his resignation and disappearance.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Ran is almost hit by a car while walking during a strong storm. Seo Chan Joo takes a taxi home but she gets out after seeing Go Jin Se's bike.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Choi Eun Hyuk talks with the president of a company about his recent absence from work. Go Jin Se visits Ran but he is scolded by one of her friends.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Seo Chan Joo receives a mysterious call that offers information about her husband. A defiant Ran resists the advice of a friend as she continues the relationship with Go Jin Se.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: A shamed Go Jin Se nervously visits Seo Chan Joo while she works at the family orchard. Ran practices dancing as Ho Gee tries to have a conversation with her.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Go Jin See tells Seo Chan Joo that he will not be visiting the dance studio again. Bae In Kyung gives up her job as rumors grow about plans for the future.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: A dismayed Choi Eun Hyuk asks to see Seo Chan Joo before he leaves town. Go Jin Se carries Seo Chan Joo as he remembers important moments from their past.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Choi Eun Hyuk and Go Jin Se meet at a bar and discuss Seo Chan Joo. After being brutally tortured, Choi Eun Hyuk discovers his captors want important files that belong to the company.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Baek In Kyung receives updates about Choi Eun Hyuk and Seo Chan Joo. Go Jin Se and Seo Chan Joo choose to divorce after unresolved issues cause problems for their marriage.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Ran makes Go Jin Se very uncomfortable during a visit. Choi Eun Hyuk asks Seo Chan Joo to travel with him as he relocates for a new job in New York.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Choi Eun Hyuk wants to see Seo Chan Joo but other people at the funeral question their time together. Baek In Kyung asks Choi Eun Hyuk to sign divorce papers and she mentions the relationship with his girlfriend.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Seo Chan Joo learns that Choi Eun Hyuk will be sent to prison as they plan their move to New York. Myung Jin knows something is wrong after receiving a call from Seo Chan Joo.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: A worried Choi Eun Hyuk thinks about ways to secure his release before a second interrogation begins. Ran meets Go Jin Se and they discuss the current status of their relationship.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Ran becomes upset after receiving a message from Go Jin Se. Baek In Kyung's doctor gives her bad news and he asks to discuss the recent diagnosis as soon as possible.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Seo Chan Joo visits the house she used to share with Go Jin Se but he does not see her. Myung Jin learns that she is pregnant after an appointment with the doctor.

imdb.title: Beloved
plot: Can a happy marriage withstand the reappearance of former lovers? Chan Joo (Park Sol Mi) and Jin Se (Hong Jong Hyun) have been happily married for the past three years after a whirlwind three-month courtship.
